text: "Best Friend" is a 1995 song by Brandy Norwood. The song was released in June 1995. The song peaked at #7 on the Hot R&B;/Hip Hop Songs Chart. It peaked at #34 on the Billboard Hot 100. The song was used on Norwood's show Moesha. Category:1995 songs Category:Brandy Norwood songs
title: Best Friend (song)
